evidence_based_hooks: No mobile site for High Point Market?
Pebl Furniture: Manual catalog navigation killing productivity

strategic_implications.messaging_strategy: Dual approach - lead with weighted, acknowledge averaged
strategic_implications.account_approach: Crisis intervention first, operational efficiency second
strategic_implications.expansion_potential: Low - focused pain point approach recommended

email_sequence.subject: Found Pebl Furniture's $3,750,000 productivity leak
email_sequence.body:
Hey John,

I analyzed Pebl Furniture's sales process and found you're losing ~3 hours daily per rep on manual order processing - that's $3,750,000 in lost productivity annually.

• No mobile site for High Point Market?
• Pebl Furniture: Manual catalog navigation killing productivity
• Your 50 reps have no portal

Butler Specialty had identical issues. Fixed in 14 days, ROI in 47 days.

Walk me through what happens when a rep takes an order at a trade show today?

15-minute call to show you their solution?

Best,
[Your Name]

email_sequence.subject: How Pebl Furniture eliminated your exact problem
email_sequence.body:
Hey John,

Pebl Furniture had Pebl Furniture's exact problem:

"Manual catalog navigation killing productivity"

Their transformation:
• Order time: 4 hours → 15 minutes
• Error rate: 30% → <1%
• Eliminated 3 hours daily per rep waste
• 47-day payback period

Proven across $2.3M customer portfolio.

Want their implementation playbook?

Best,
[Your Name]

email_sequence.subject: 3 companies solved Pebl Furniture's exact challenges
email_sequence.body:
Hey John,

3 companies solved Pebl Furniture's challenges:

• Butler Specialty: 300% rep productivity increase
• Godinger Silver: "Best thing in 25 years"
• Wildwood Lamps: 33% fewer support calls

All report 25-40% productivity increases within 90 days.

12-minute video showing their results?

Best,
[Your Name]

email_sequence.subject: $3,750,000 impact for Pebl Furniture
email_sequence.body:
Hey John,

Pebl Furniture's current inefficiencies:

• Productivity loss: $1,500,000/year
• Error costs: $1,312,500/year  
• Trade show waste: $937,500/year
• Total impact: $3,750,000/year

Investment: $20K/year
Payback: 47 days (validated across 15 customers)
5-Year ROI: 937x

Want your custom ROI model? Takes 15 minutes.

Best,
[Your Name]

email_sequence.subject: 3 competitors just passed Pebl Furniture
email_sequence.body:
Hey John,

While Pebl Furniture uses manual processes, 3 direct competitors digitized in 2024:

• Universal Furniture: 25% sales increase
• Theodore Alexander: 40% faster quotes  
• Butler Specialty: 300% rep productivity

Your competitors are 40% faster. Quote time: Them (minutes) vs You (hours).

Should we discuss closing this gap before High Point Market?

Best,
[Your Name]
email_sequence.claude_prompt:
Write a direct, punchy B2B sales email about competitive threats.

Context:
- Company: Pebl Furniture
- Contact: John
- Evidence: No mobile site for High Point Market?
- Competitors: Universal Furniture, Theodore Alexander, Butler Specialty

Requirements:
- Start with "Hey John,"
- Lead with competitive reality: "While Pebl Furniture uses manual processes, 3 competitors digitized in 2024"
- List specific competitor wins: Universal (25% sales increase), Theodore Alexander (40% faster quotes), Butler (300% rep productivity)
- Include urgency: "Your competitors are 40% faster. Quote time: Them (minutes) vs You (hours)"
- End with: "Should we discuss closing this gap before High Point Market?"
- Keep under 80 words
- No corporate speak, direct and urgent tone

Generate ONLY the email body, no subject line.

email_sequence.subject: 35 days to High Point Market - Pebl Furniture ready?
email_sequence.body:
Hey John,

35 days until High Point Market.

Your $32,000 booth investment is at risk. Without mobile orders, you'll lose 60% of opportunities to competitors who can quote on-spot.

Setup takes 14 days. Must start this week to be ready.

15-minute call to map out implementation?

Best,
[Your Name]
email_sequence.claude_prompt:
Write a direct, urgent B2B sales email about trade show deadlines.

Context:
- Company: Pebl Furniture
- Contact: John
- Trade show: High Point Market in 35 days
- Booth investment: $32,000
- Risk: 60% opportunity loss without mobile capability

Requirements:
- Start with "Hey John,"
- Create urgency: "35 days until High Point Market"
- Highlight risk: "Your $32,000 booth investment is at risk"
- Specific threat: "Without mobile orders, you'll lose 60% of opportunities to competitors who can quote on-spot"
- Timeline pressure: "Setup takes 14 days. Must start this week to be ready"
- End with: "15-minute call to map out implementation?"
- Keep under 70 words
- Direct, urgent tone

Generate ONLY the email body, no subject line.

email_sequence.subject: How Pebl Furniture saved $650,000 annually
email_sequence.body:
Hey John,

Pebl Furniture case study deep dive:

Situation: 8,000 SKUs, 4-hour order cycle, 30% error rate

Solution: Deployed in 14 days, customized for their pricing model

Results (90 days):
• Order time: 4 hours → 15 minutes
• Errors: 30% → <1%
• Eliminated 3 hours daily per rep waste
• Annual savings: $650,000

Customer: "Manual catalog navigation killing productivity"

Want their implementation playbook? (12-minute video)

Best,
[Your Name]
email_sequence.claude_prompt:
Write a detailed B2B case study email with specific transformation data.

Context:
- Company: Pebl Furniture
- Contact: John
- Case study: Pebl Furniture
- Quote: "Manual catalog navigation killing productivity"
- Transformation: Eliminated 3 hours daily per rep waste

Requirements:
- Start with "Hey John,"
- Deep dive into Pebl Furniture's transformation
- Include specific before/after metrics: 8,000 SKUs, 4-hour order cycle → 15 minutes, 30% errors → <1%
- Timeline: "Deployed in 14 days, customized for their pricing model"
- Results: "Order time: 4 hours → 15 minutes, Errors: 30% → <1%, Annual savings: $650,000"
- Customer quote: "Manual catalog navigation killing productivity"
- End with: "Want their implementation playbook? (12-minute video)"
- Keep under 100 words
- Focus on specific transformation details

Generate ONLY the email body, no subject line.

email_sequence.subject: Resources for Pebl Furniture (breaking up)
email_sequence.body:
Hey John,

Haven't heard back, assuming this isn't a priority right now.

Before I go, here's some value:
• ROI Calculator for furniture manufacturers
• 2025 State of Furniture Sales report
• High Point Market success guide

Warning: Butler Specialty waited 2 years, cost them $1.4M.

Door remains open if priorities change.

Best,
[Your Name]
email_sequence.claude_prompt:
Write a professional breakup email with value.

Context:
- Company: Pebl Furniture
- Contact: John
- Lost value: $3,750,000 annually
- Warning example: Butler Specialty waited 2 years, cost them $1.4M

Requirements:
- Start with "Hey John,"
- Acknowledge no response: "Haven't heard back, assuming not a priority"
- Offer value before leaving: ROI Calculator, 2025 Furniture Sales report, High Point Market guide
- Include warning: "Butler Specialty waited 2 years, cost them $1.4M"
- Professional close: "Door remains open if priorities change"
- Keep under 80 words
- Professional but include consequence warning

Generate ONLY the email body, no subject line.
